verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> That the <S%G3588><s%> heir, <S%G2818><s%> as long as <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G5550><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> differeth <S%G1308><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from a servant, <S%G1401><s%> though he be <S%G5607><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> of all; <S%G3956><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> tutors <S%G2012><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> governors <S%G3623><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time appointed <S%G4287><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we were <S%G2258><s%> children, <S%G3516><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> in bondage <S%G1402><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> elements <S%G4747><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> was come, <S%G2064><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent forth <S%G1821><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> a woman, <S%G1135><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%>

To <S%G2443><s%> redeem <S%G1805><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that were under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we might receive <S%G618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> adoption of sons. <S%G5206><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath sent forth <S%G1821><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> crying, <S%G2896><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> a servant, <S%G1401><s%> but <S%G235><s%> a son; <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> an heir <S%G2818><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> then, <S%G5119><s%> when <S%G3303><s%> ye knew <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> ye did service <S%G1398><s%> unto them which by nature <S%G5449><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> gods. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> after that ye have known <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> are known <S%G1097><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> ye again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beggarly <S%G4434><s%> elements, <S%G4747><s%> whereunto <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G3825><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> again <S%G509><s%> to be in bondage? <S%G1398><s%>
Ye observe <S%G3906><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> times, <S%G2540><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> years. <S%G1763><s%>
I am afraid <S%G5399><s%> of you, <S%G5209><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> I have bestowed upon you labor <S%G2872><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5209><s%> in vain. <S%G1500><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I beseech <S%G1189><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am; for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> am as <S%G5613><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are: ye have not injured me at all. <S%G3762><s%> <S%G91><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

Ye <S%G1161><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> I preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> at the first. <S%G4386><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> ye despised <S%G1848><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> rejected; <S%G1609><s%> but <S%G235><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Where <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2258><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blessedness <S%G3108><s%> ye <S%G5216><s%> spake of? for <S%G1063><s%> I bear you record, <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5213><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it had been possible, <S%G1415><s%> ye would have plucked out <S%G1846><s%> <S%G302><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and have given <S%G1325><s%> them to me. <S%G3427><s%>
Am I therefore <S%G5620><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> enemy, <S%G2190><s%> because I tell you the truth? <S%G226><s%> <S%G5213><s%>

They zealously affect <S%G2206><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> but not <S%G3756><s%> well; <S%G2573><s%> yea, <S%G235><s%> they would <S%G2309><s%> exclude <S%G1576><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might affect <S%G2206><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%> to be zealously affected <S%G2206><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> thing, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> when I <S%G3165><s%> am present <S%G3918><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

My <S%G3450><s%> little children, <S%G5040><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I travail in birth <S%G5605><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> until <S%G891><s%> <S%G3757><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be formed <S%G3445><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%>

I <S%G1161><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> to be present <S%G3918><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to change <S%G236><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> voice; <S%G5456><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I stand in doubt <S%G639><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

Tell <S%G3004><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> ye that desire <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> do ye not <S%G3756><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law? <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> a bondmaid, <S%G3814><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> other <S%G1520><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> a freewoman. <S%G1658><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> who was of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> freewoman <S%G1658><s%> was by <S%G1223><s%> promise. <S%G1860><s%>

Which things <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> an allegory: <S%G238><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> covenants; <S%G1242><s%> the one <S%G3391><s%> <S%G3303><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai, <S%G4614><s%> which engendereth <S%G1080><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> bondage, <S%G1397><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Hagar. <S%G28><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this Hagar <S%G28><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Arabia, <S%G688><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> answereth to <S%G4960><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> which now <S%G3568><s%> is, and <S%G1161><s%> is in bondage <S%G1398><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G848><s%> children. <S%G5043><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> which is above <S%G507><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> free, <S%G1658><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> thou barren <S%G4723><s%> that bearest <S%G5088><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> break forth <S%G4486><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cry, <S%G994><s%> thou that travailest <S%G5605><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> desolate <S%G2048><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> she which hath <S%G2192><s%> a husband. <S%G435><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> was, are <S%G2070><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of promise. <S%G1860><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he that was born <S%G1080><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> that was born after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it is now. <S%G3568><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Scripture? <S%G1124><s%> Cast out <S%G1544><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> son: <S%G5207><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> bondwoman <S%G3814><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> be heir <S%G2816><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> freewoman. <S%G1658><s%>
So then, <S%G686><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of the bondwoman, <S%G3814><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> free. <S%G1658><s%>
